description:
Speaker: Florian Bruhin

The pytest tool presents a rapid and simple way to write tests for your Python code. This training gives an introduction with exercises to some distinguishing features.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference.
https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/WRHHSF
Follow us on Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pydataberlin, https://twitter.com/pyconde
title: pytest - simple, rapid and fun testing with Python
